name: Spectral Phantasy
description:
Story:

You come to find yourself taking shelter in a seemingly abandoned mansion for the night after your car had broken down.

As you explore the various rooms of the manor, you begin to realize that it isn't quite as abandoned as it initially seemed. 

Perhaps you should have listened to the local ghost stories about Briarwood Manor...

(A short little spooky dating sim featuring a friendly ghost boy named Cyrus as the love interest! Just in time for Halloween.)

Features: 

- 18,800 words

- 3 endings

- Gender neutral player character

- Custom name for player character 

- Original artwork

Development:

Coding, art, writing by Starfait (Sokkvabekkr)

Bug testing by Darth1117, Mangosteen and Metafright

BGM by PurplePlanet

SFX by Zapsplat

Content Warnings:

- Brief mentions of death

- Some strong language
